title: Sin Wei Tong - Viva Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Chinese, Take-out, Malaysian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Also known as Sin Wei Tong Cafe and also Sin Mei Cafe. Has a dedicated vegetarian stall selling Chinese & Malay rice, noodle and laksa dishes, herbal teas. Some dishes have egg but can request without. Located in Jln Green Hill budget accommodation area.
